r.d: A collection of comon image manipulations.
r.n: Implements the new Image_Tools package structure and fixes the following bugs: 176, Antialiasing done wrong 177, correction for Image_Text-constructor 178, error in comment-block 179, textsize and position 180, Antialiasing-setting don't get through 188, Typo in Image_Text.php 189, Methods called as class variables
